name: Sharky Tank
description: We’re excited to invite you to Sharky Tank, UBCO’s fast-paced, pitching-style competition where students channel their inner entrepreneurs! Compete for prizes totaling over $1000! Date: Tuesday Nov 25th. Location: ART 114. Time: 6:30pm - 8:30pm

name: Pancake Day
description: Nov. 28th, 8:30AM-4:30PM Junior Collegia (UNC336) Join the Collegia team for a full day of pancakes.

name: Graduate Student Coffee Catch-Up
description: Free coffee and snacks for graduate students. Wednesdays, 12 Noon, ASC 460

name: Mehmooni
description: Free food! Traditional Persian Cuisine. Suo Persian student association. Friday, November 21 6-10 PM ASC 140

name: Brain Freeze And Book Freeze
description: Got brain freeze from all that studying? We're serving up ice cream, good company, and a chill space to get things done. Thursday December 4, 6:30-9:30pm ARTS 102 + 104

name: Gym Buddies
description: The pride resouce center is offering a program that pairs 2SLGBTQ+ people who want to do more physical activity (mentees) with mentors. Free drop-in to the hangar.

name: Trivia Night
description: The canadian cancar society presents trivia night friday 28 novemeber at ubco lib305. doors open at 6:30pm prizes for top teams.

name: Paskong Pinoy
description: Filipino Student Association annual event gingerbread competition UNC 200 Nov 29 5:30 PM.

name: Backcountry Squatters Ski Touring Social
description: Backcountry squatters come get stoked for ski season with us and watch some short films. November 23 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM

name: Fruity Friending
description: Nov. 23rd 6-7pm Nechako gathering room Queer speed-friending, free snacks, painting origami, crocheting.

name: NBA 2k26 Tournament
description: Join us for the 2K26 Basketball Tournament hosted by the Black Student Space! Friday, November 28th 1 pm to 6pm COM 121

name: Wild'n Out Games Night
description: BSSP is teaming up with the ACSC to host a chill games night. November 27 6:30 to 8:30 pm Global Collegium EME 0252

name: Friendship bracelet making
description: November 24 at 4:00 pm - 6:00 pm Free Relax, unwind and craft a friendship bracelet in the Upper Levels (Senior) Collegium.

name: Women's Workout Times
description: November 25 Women’s Workout Times occur in Term 1 in Studio 2 from 10 am to 12 noon. Join the Girls Who Lift club.

name: Deep Breath: A Mindful Forest Walk
description: November 25 at 12:00 pm - 12:45 pm Step into the stillness of the trees and leave the campus rush behind! This community walk invites students, faculty, and staff to get active on the beautiful, forested Pine Loop Trail.

name: Community Meal
description: November 25 at 12:00 pm - 1:30 pm Build community, share culture, and enjoy a free, nourishing meal. Hosted by Picnic (and sometimes partners).
